thread.title: Rick Astley Is Reportedly Creating His Own Beer
thread.title_full: Rick Astley Is Reportedly Creating His Own Beer

title: Rick Astley Is Reportedly Creating His Own Beer
text:
Rick Astley Is Reportedly Creating His Own Beer 
You wouldn't get these hops from any other guy. By Sammy Nickalls Jan 2, 2017 We're no strangers to beer. You know the rules, and so does he. A fruity pilsner's what he's thinking of. You wouldn't get these hops from any other guy. Rick Astley is working with a Danish brewery to create a "fruity pilsner lager," according to the Irish Mirror . A self-dubbed beer lover, Astley just needs a name for his lager, he explained. "I enjoy a beer with friends and I'm hoping to sell my own brand soon," he told Weekend magazine, according to the Mirror . "I've been working with the Mikkeller brewery in Copenhagen, which was founded 10 years ago by a teacher who made his own beer at home." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Astley added that Mikkiller beer is "quite experimental" and that he's been sampling various bottles sent to him by the company, which was set up in 2006 and sells beer to over 40 countries. "Some are quite fruityâ€”one was a pear beer they make for a restaurant, but we've gone for a pilsner type lager," he said. "All I need now is a name for it." Don't tell me you're too blind to see what you should name it, man.
